Understate: The claim may understate the seriousness of the threat posed by individuals carrying zip cuffs at the U.S. Capitol insurrection. Falters at times: The claim falters at times by downplaying the purpose of the zip ties in the attack on the Capitol. The expert notes that Shapiro appeared to downplay the seriousness of the threat posed by people with zip ties, which can be seen as a flaw in the claim.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to fully address the purpose and intentions of individuals carrying zip cuffs at the U.S. Capitol insurrection. Exist alternative explanation: The claim may not fully consider alternative explanations for individuals owning zip ties.
